articles.author: Leah Asmelash, CNN
articles.title: UC Berkeley faces backlash after stating 'xenophobia' is 'common' or 'normal' reaction to coronavirus
articles.description: After the University of California at Berkeley listed "xenophobia" as a reaction to coronavirus, some said the school was normalizing racism.

articles.author: Shannon Liao, CNN Business
articles.title: Apple temporarily closes all 42 stores in China as coronavirus spreads
articles.description: Apple is temporarily closing all of its stores in China because of the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.author: Barbara Starr and Kevin Bohn, CNN
articles.title: Pentagon to provide housing for up to 1,000 people over coronavirus concerns

articles.author: Jamie Gumbrecht, CNN
articles.title: 8th US coronavirus case confirmed in Massachusetts
articles.description: US Coronovirus: Eighth case confirmed in the US in a Boston man.
articles.content:
(CNN)An eighth case of coronavirus in the United States has been confirmed in a Boston man in his 20s, health officials said Saturday.
The man recently returned from Wuhan, China, the epicenter of the outbreak, Boston and Massachusetts health officials said … [+691 chars]

articles.author: Shannon Liao, CNN Business
articles.title: Major US airlines expand flight cancellations to China and Hong Kong
articles.description: American Airlines and Delta Air Lines announced more flight cancellations to China on Saturday as coronavirus cases rise rapidly.

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Bitcoin is soaring as investors panic about coronavirus
articles.description: Bitcoin is once again having a moment. The crypytocurrency has soared 30% this year as fears about the coronavirus outbreak send shock waves throughout global stock markets. The price of one bitcoin is hovering around $9,300. Can the rally continue?

articles.title: Watch China's 'talking drones' warning citizens
articles.description: Officials in China have started using drones equipped with speakers to warn citizens to wear masks as coronavirus continues to spread in the country.

articles.author: By Kate Springer, CNN Travel
articles.title: Tourism industry hit hard as Chinese tourists stay home
articles.description: China is the world's largest market for outbound travel. With the country banning group trips and countries closing their borders, the absence of Chinese travelers will be felt around the world.
articles.content:
Kate Springer, CNN TravelUpdated 1st February 2020
Hong Kong (CNN) At 6 p.m. on Saturday, Bill Egerton received an alarming email.

articles.title: Nearly 12,000 cases of the coronavirus worldwide
articles.content:

articles.description: Streets are empty and markets are closed in Chinese cities that are home to millions of people. See these first-hand accounts of life in China during the coronavirus outbreak.
